posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I like the gutsy Monk http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 07622.html
Love the AC (nude/nude+defensive stance): 38/42

The problem is no dodge or any uncanny dodge. Anybody know of a build that will give me the same
AC with dodge uncanny dodge and epic dodge??

David

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Invisible Wall http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 44136.html
Movable Wall http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 48006.html

posts.author: WhiZard
posts.content: If you are looking at monk 20 in an epic dodge build, I'd suggest you drop the dwarven defender. Monk already has 20/+1 DR for scripted physical damage (i.e. spells and abilities cannot penetrate damage reduction). The damage reduction from dwarven defender does not stack with this. And if you are in a server where there is high damage (including positive), it might be a whole lot better to go the high AC route than the Dwarven Defender DR route.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content: That is what I am thinking. Looking for a build that has dodge uncanny dodge and epic dodge
